function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 transmission through human-to-human interaction","Impact":"Potential risk of infection for tourists","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to public health guidelines, vaccination, and use of personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, sanitation stations, air purification systems","People":"Tourists, local residents, travel industry workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, travel industry"}]}
